posts.post_content:
Dead perfect centering.  This has been in our collection for a very long time. 

Pics available upon request.   Prefer to trade for Cobb Green 2 or better or Cobb Red 4.  Or any T206 Drum + cash for you.  Or equivalent value in raw vg/ex or better T206 cards that I need. .

Available FS at $2700 OBO

Glove at hip pose.

Scans are available upon request.  It presents like a strong “5” but does have a spot of staining on the top border which probably accounts for a slightly lessor grade.
Sent a PM requesting pic. Thank you.
Still available.  Will entertain trade or trade + cash offers.
